short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A productivity tool designed to keep you focused by distracting sites. Break automatic habits, stay on track with deep work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Getting things done is hard when you constantly get distracted by social media.

Stay focused and boost your productivity with this simple yet effective Chrome extension. Designed to help you overcome distractions, this tool blocks access to social media and other common time-wasters on the internet.

With just one click, you can enable distraction-free mode and redirect your energy toward meaningful work. Break the cycle of automatic browsing habits and create an environment that encourages deep focus and concentration.

Whether youâ€™re studying, working on a project, or simply trying to stay disciplined, this extension supports you in reclaiming your time and achieving your goals. Customize your settings to fit your needs, and let the extension help you stay in control of your online habits.
